title: Plate, "Portrait of Fyodor Notgaft", ca. 1920
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular plate with shaped rim; in the center a portrait of Fyodor Notgaft;a wide band of dark red around border, edged by thin lines of gilding; inscribed under portrait: "Notgaft" (in Russian)

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Portrait of Fyodor Notgaft", ca. 1920.
ca. 1920. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-1.
